<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stay Down!](/Feats.aspx?ID=4978) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 176 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Trigger**
A prone foe within your reach Stands

</column>

---

You have ways of keeping your foes down. Attempt an Athletics check against the triggering foe’s Fortitude DC. On a success, the action is disrupted, causing the creature to remain prone. On a critical success, the creature also can’t Stand until its next turn.
name: Stay Down!
